howToPlay.instructions: Guess the mystery country either by typing the name of a valid country in the textbox or choosing a country from the list. Tap "Guess " or press enter on your keyboard to see clues of where the mystery country is located based by your guess.
howToPlay.exampleText1: Your first guess is AUSTRALIA, which is 13839KM away from the mystery country. The arrow points at the direction which the mystery country is located, in this case it is in the northwest direction. The background color is red because your guess is far away from the mystery country.
howToPlay.exampleText2: AFGHANISTAN is your second guess which has a yellow background color and is closer than your last guess. The country is 4353KM away and the mystery country is located northwest from the guessed country.
howToPlay.exampleText3: Your third guess is ALBANIA and it is 670KM away and the mystery country is located north from the guessed country. When your getting fairly close to the mystery country the background color is green.
howToPlay.exampleText4: Next and last guess is HUNGARY which is the mystery country.

settings.filterCountriesDialogText: Do you want to cancel the ongoing guess and start over?
